title: El Umbral del Poder
description: Raistlin casts the magical spell that has cost him so much. For him, the Portal opensâ€¦But at the same instant, his twin brother, Caramon operates the magical time-traveling device. The fields of magic shift and collide.Caramon and the kender, Tasslehoff, are flung into an unexpected time and place where they make a horrifying discovery.And Raistlin enters the Abyss, prepared to face his most deadly challenge---Takhisis, Queen of Darkness.
author: Margaret Weis
